hero.subheader: the ultimate AI-powered theme generator for your design needs
hero.paragraph: Say goodbye to hours of brainstorming and testing different color schemes and themes for your projects. With ThemeMaster AI, you can generate stunning and unique designs in a matter of seconds.

CTA.header: Ready to start creating stunning designs with ThemeMaster AI?
CTA.subheader: With a ThemeMaster AI account, you can save your favourite colour palettes
CTA.button: Sign up for a free account today !

benefits.subheader: With ThemeMaster AI, you can create and save custom color palettes that reflect your brand's identity.
Creating a color palette from scratch can be time-consuming and frustrating, especially if you're not experienced with color theory.
While it's important to maintain a consistent brand image, it's also important to keep your designs fresh and interesting.
